mysite

Work with FBX Prefab Variants

Easily convert GameObjects and Prefab assets to Prefab Variants based on FBX files to enable a convenient FBX model workflow between Unity and your 3D modeling application.

Section Description
FBX files and Prefab Variants Review Unity core concepts about FBX files, Model Prefabs, and Prefab Variants.
FBX Prefab Variant workflow Learn about the benefits and limitations of using Prefab Variants based on FBX files.
Convert a GameObject to an FBX Prefab Variant Convert a GameObject and its children to a Prefab Variant based on an FBX model.
Convert a Prefab asset to an FBX Prefab Variant Convert a Prefab asset file to a Prefab Variant based on an FBX model.
Create a Prefab Variant based on an existing FBX model Create a Prefab Variant based on an existing FBX Model Prefab without having to perform FBX re-export.
Convert Options window Get the description of all settings available in the Convert Options window that displays when you perform a conversion to an FBX Prefab Variant.
